name: Summit — Booth

price_options.name: Basic Booth — advertiser rate
price_options.notes: Target market: any business, especially under $10,000 annual budget.Offers discounted pricing and added visibility for companies that already advertise with Ateema through other marketing products.

price_options.name: Basic Booth — non-advertiser rate
price_options.notes: Target market: any business, especially under $10,000 annual budget.Provides full exhibitor benefits at the standard rate for businesses not currently advertising with Ateema.

price_options.name: Premium Booth
price_options.notes: Target market: any business, especially under $15,000 annual budget.Provides a prime trade show location with one six-foot table, directory listing, four event tickets, and load-in assistance.

price_options.name: Double Booth
price_options.notes: Target market: any business, especially under $15,000 annual budget.Offers two six-foot tables, directory listing, six event tickets, and premium floor placement with load-in assistance.

price_options.name: Double Premium
price_options.notes: Target market: any business, especially under $15,000 annual budget.Delivers prime floor placement and marketing visibility for double booth seeking brand recognition

price_options.name: Dominant Booth
price_options.notes: Target market: any business, especially under $15,000 annual budget.Provides a premium location with one six-foot table, six event tickets, load-in support, and exclusive brand visibility through video screen ads, email and signage logos, plus a half-page program advertisement.

price_options.name: Double Dominant
price_options.notes: Target market: any business, especially under $15,000 annual budget.Offers expanded space and top-tier brand exposure with two tables, premium placement, and multi-channel marketing visibility

price_options.name: Illinois CVB Booth (in Illinois) — Local DMO
price_options.notes: Target market: any CVB (convention bureau in Illinois).This is a collective exhibition space for regional CVBs, offering one six-foot table, ten event tickets, directory listing, and shared sponsor visibility through program ads and on-site screen promotion within the featured “Beyond Chicago Square.”

price_options.name: Illinois CVB Double Booth — Local DMO
price_options.notes: Target market: any CVB (convention bureau in Illinois).It offers two six-foot tables, fifteen event tickets, and inclusion in the featured “Beyond Chicago Square” collective exhibit, with sponsor recognition through a half-page program ad and on-screen promotion to highlight Chicagoland CVBs and businesses

price_options.name: DMO (out of Illinois)
price_options.notes: Target market: any CVB or DMO from outside of Illinois.

product_description: The Summit Booth products provide one-time exhibitor opportunities for businesses to showcase their brand, network with 1,200+ hospitality professionals, and gain visibility through tiered booth options and marketing exposure.
